forecast-period.text: A return to "buildup" type conditions over the Top End with afternoon and evening showers and storms, mainly in the north and west. South of the Top End, isolated showers and thunderstorms, contracting to the western borders over the weekend as a high moving across the Bight directs a drier southeast flow into the Territory. Warmer northerly winds developing over the south next week ahead of a trough approaching from the west.
For latest warnings go to www.bom.gov.au, subscribe to RSS feeds, call 1300 659 214* or listen for warnings on relevant TV and radio broadcasts.
* Calls to 1300 numbers cost around 27.5c inc GST, higher from mobiles or public phones.

Mostly sunny over the Barkly, Simpson, eastern Carpentaria and southeast Lasseter Districts, a slight to medium chance of showers and storms elsewhere. Light winds, tending moderate southeast to northeast south of Katherine.

Mostly sunny over the eastern Lasseter, eastern Tanami, Barkly, Simpson, Carpentaria and southern Arnhem Districts, a slight to medium chance of showers and storms elsewhere. Light winds, tending moderate southeast to northeast south of Daly Waters, and turning northerly over the Tanami and Lasseter Districts during the day.

Sunny over the eastern Tanami, Barkly, Simpson, Carpentaria and southern Arnhem Districts with a slight to medium chance of showers and storms elsewhere. Light winds, tending moderate southeast to northeast south of Daly Waters, and turning to the northwest over the Tanami and Lasseter Districts during the day.

A slight to medium chance of showers and storms over the northern and western Top End and along the western borders, sunny elsewhere. Light winds, tending moderate southeast to northeast south of Daly Waters, and turning to the northwest over the Tanami and Lasseter Districts during the day. A late southerly change in the far southwest.
